Butuh Kapal Selam dan Jet, Prabowo Koordinasi ke Pindad, PT PAL, dan PT DI
05 Nov 2019, 20:26 by Lisye Sri Rahayu
Jakarta - Menteri Pertahanan (Menhan) Prabowo Subianto dan Wamenhan Wahyu Sakti Trenggono esok hari akan mengunjungi PT Pindad di Bandung, Jawa Barat. Kunjungan itu bertujuan untuk mengambangkan industri pertahanan di tinggal nasional maupun kawasan.
"Jadi ini bagian dari, istilahnya kita mau liat langsung apa yang terjadi di Pindad, maksudnya itu belanja masalahlah. Kalau ada masalah kita mesti lihat, kan kita juga ingin mengembangkan industri pertahanan nasional. Supaya kita berperan dan berbicara di kawasan," ujar Trenggono di Kemhan, Jalan Medan Merdeka Barat, Jakarta Pusat, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Trenggono menyebut, dia diajak langsung oleh Prabowo ke PT Pindad yang merupakan perusahaan BUMN, bergerak dalam bidang Alutsista (Alat Utama Sistem Persenjataan). Dia juga menjelaskan jajaran Kemhan dan TNI telah melakukan diskusi terkait kebutuhan alat utama sistem persenjataan (alutsista) ke depan.
"Nah jadi memang kita belum (ke Pindad), sehingga Pak Menteri ajak saya juga, bersama-sama. Kemarin habis di internal kemudian kita rapat koordinasi dengan kolega kita, Mabes TNI, kemudian tiga angkatan, kita ketemu diskusi bahkan tadi kita diskusi lagi soal kira-kira perkembangan ke depan dari sisi kebutuhan alutsista," kata dia.
Selain ke PT Pindad, Prabowo juga berancana akan mengunjungi PT PAL Indonesia yang bergerak di bidang industri galangan kapal. Menurutnya kemampuan perkapalan Indonesia juga harus ditingkatkan.
"Apalagi kita ini negara kepaulaun, selain tidak hanya Pindad tapi juga seperti PT PAL, kemampuan-kemampuan dibidang perkapalan dan lain sebagainya," kata dia.

Need Submarines and Jets, Prabowo Coordinates to Pindad, PT PAL, and PT DI
05 Nov 2019, 20:26 by Lisye Sri Rahayu
Jakarta - Minister of Defense (Menhan) Prabowo Subianto and Deputy Minister of Defense Wahyu Sakti Trenggono tomorrow will visit PT Pindad in Bandung, West Java. The visit aims to develop the defense industry in national and regional residence.
"So this is part of, the term we want to see directly what happened in Pindad, meaning that shopping is a problem. If there are problems we must look at, we also want to develop the national defense industry. So that we play a role and speak in the region," said Trenggono in Kemhan, Jalan Medan Merdeka Barat, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
Trenggono said, he was invited directly by Prabowo to PT Pindad which is a state-owned company, engaged in the defense equipment (Main Tool for Armament Systems). He also explained that the Ministry of Defense and the TNI had held discussions regarding the need for the main weaponry system (defense equipment) going forward.
"So indeed we have not (to Pindad), so the Minister invited me too, together. Yesterday, it was finished internally, then we held a coordination meeting with our colleague, TNI Headquarters, then three forces, we met with a discussion, even before we discussed again about "about future developments in terms of defense equipment needs," he said.
In addition to PT Pindad, Prabowo also plans to visit PT PAL Indonesia, which is engaged in the shipyard industry. According to him the ability of Indonesian shipping must also be improved.
"Moreover, we are a kepaulaun country, besides not only Pindad but also like PT PAL, capabilities in shipping and so on," he said.
